name: Bhop Jump
description:
Finally you don't need a PC to bhop. Install free Bhop Jump app and bunny hop whenever you want on your smartphone.

Bhop - is a bunny hop way of jumping, familiar to all cs bhop fans.

Tap left and right to make air strafes. Try to make as much strafes as possible to increase speed and make long jumps.

Leaderboards for world records are included, as well as online chat. Finish bunny hop maps faster and compare your results with friends and other bhop masters.

New knifes, gloves and skins are waiting for you in Marketplace.

Are you a Bhop pro or a newbie? Prove that, go beat all the maps and get world records!

This application includes a "Remove ads" option that allows you to play without ads. "Remove ads" option is lifetime and costs $3.99 USD or equivalent in your local currency.

Privacy Policy URL: http://bhopjump.com/privacypolicy.htm
Terms of Use URL: http://bhopjump.com/termsofuse.htm
